game.name: LlamaRPG: Farm to Fable
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A JRPG that brings you face to face with challenging combat, class customization, and tough choices. Trade items, create unique characters and fight other players. Bring your llama to greener pastures while never running out of things to explore or enemies to vanquish.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A JRPG that brings you face to face with challenging combat, class customization, and tough choices. Trade items, create unique characters and fight other players. Bring your llama to greener pastures while never running out of things to explore or enemies to vanquish.
